author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1506025, resolve the issue uncovered by r1506554, by making
the Windows test runner properly check the build graph to detect which dlls
to copy instead of just checking the in memory build.conf sections.
(locate_libs): Use model. Detect if file exists before copying.

author: pkluegl
msg: - started with new language constructs beyond sequential matching
- replaced disjunctive type matcher by disjunctive composed rule elements
- started with conjunctive composed rule elements

author: gmazza
msg: More JPA changes necessary for Roller to work OOTB on JBoss' Hibernate implementation (conversion from annotations to JPA XML mapping files for the three entity classes using them turned out not to be necessary but kept change anyway.)

author: angela
msg: JCR-3630 : XSS in DirListingExportHandler (patch provided by lars krapf)
